articles.content: There now has been 2,779 positive tests in South Dakota with 1,977 reported as having recovered. That leaves 773 active cases in the state down 29 from Tuesday. There are 72 people currently hospitalized, down three from Tuesday. The state has reported 230 pe… [+1334 chars]

articles.title: Dermatologists treat patients with COVID toes as more symptoms become known - The Denver Channel
articles.description: Dr. Fromowitz says he and other dermatologists are thankful that doctors in Europe, who first noticed the condition, informed their U.S. counterparts so they weren't caught off guard.
articles.content:
The most common symptoms of COVID-19 in patients include shortness of breath, fever and a cough. A new, unusual symptom, though, is gaining widespread attention: COVID toes.
"All of us expected this to be a respiratory virus, and as it evolved, we realized t… [+2116 chars]
